column1: Smoque BBQ////This is a no frills BBQ joint that is there to do one thing
column2: and it is to deliver to your taste buds the best BBQ this side of the Midwest. Any BBQ place worth its salt does one thing right
column3: and that is the brisket. Smoque absolutely does not disappoint in this regard. It is juicy
column5: and practically melts in your mouth with each bite. The ribs are also great
column6: as is the Mac N Cheese and BBQ chicken. If you are craving or missing some southern BBQ
